title: Bolt On - Main Base
description:
We are pleased to bring you HYPERSPIN BOLT-ON EDITION. A cleverly designed Hyperspin installation for those who may have struggled with it in the past. 

Hyperspin Bolt-on Edition gives you the main base and then we regulary release packs you just bolt-on - see http://www.arcadepunk.co.uk for a full list (click HS BOLT-ON) - The Bolt-on Team intend to fill up to 8TB with Bolt-on packs, please seed when downloaded or we will not continue to release on Public Torrents.

So you download this main base pack, which includes a couple of systems, then simply choose which bolt-on systems you want, all bolt-on systems come with instructions (and even videos on the website www.arcadepunk.co.uk )

WHAT YOU SHOULD BE RUNNING

This system is set up for WINDOWS 7 64 BIT, thus everything in the main download and future bolt on packs will be configured for WINDOWS 7 64 BIT, if you do not have this installed on the machine you wish to use then continue at your own pearl, but we URGE you to use the same operating system that everything is configured for. To check your version of Windows go to your CONTROL PANEL and click SYSTEM, it should tell you there.

The download needs to be running from DRIVE D: in the root, you may need to change the drive letters of your drives (such as DVD ROM) in order to make sure the drive you copy over to is DRIVE D:

For help with installation see the video and instructions here : http://www.arcadepunk.co.uk/part-2-base-install-hyperspin-complete-download/

Set up instructions and video here : 
http://www.arcadepunk.co.uk/part-3-setup-download-complete-hyperspin/

Faq and bug reporting here: 
http://www.arcadepunk.co.uk/part-4-bugs/

Bolt-on Pack listings here:  
http://www.arcadepunk.co.uk/part-5-bolt-packs/

Officialpage here
